summary: An ordinance appropriating the sum of $35.00 out of the General Fund of the City of Seattle to pay the clam of Leon B. F. Foster for damages done to house owned and operated by said claimant located at 1344 Alki Avenue, Seattle, said damages being occasioned by the breaking of a sewer pipe located on 45th Avenue Southwest, adjacent to said premises, which flooded said premises with mud and debris, on the 10th day of February, 1916, and authorizing the drawing of a warrant therefor.
